# Draft:My Talking Tom Friends 2

My Talking Tom Friends 2 is a mobile virtual pet game by Outfit7, released on November 6, 2018. It is the sequel to the original My Talking Tom and the fourth game in the My Talking virtual pet series. The game features Tom and his friends, with expanded gameplay that includes taking care of multiple characters in one house, mini-games, and new pets like the parrot Flip.
Gameplay
The central gameplay revolves around caring for the six main charactersâ€”Talking Tom, Angela, Hank, Ben, Becca, and (now available via update) Ginger.
My Talking Tom Friends 2 expands on the original's formula with a semi-open world neighborhood for the characters to explore. Instead of a single house, the gameplay is spread across different locations with a greater variety of activities, mini-games, and interactions.
Each character has their own uniquely styled house, such as Tom's loft or Angela's art studio, which players can explore and customize with decorations.
You can visit personalized houses for each character, as well as communal areas like the park, a food store, and a boutique.
You must feed, bathe, and put the friends to sleep to keep them happy. The game has a day-night cycle that adds to the flow of managing their routines.
The game moves beyond a single house to a neighborhood, allowing for more interactions and a greater variety of activities. The characters can explore a water park, grocery store, and park.
Unlike the original My Talking Tom Friends where characters made simple sounds, the characters in the sequel now speak real words, adding more personality.
Beyond the immediate neighborhood, players can take a bus to different locations, like the Water Park, for new activities and surprises. More worlds are expected in future updates
The game offers a wide range of activities beyond mini-games, including growing vegetables in a greenhouse, hosting picnics, and building gadgets.
By progressing through the game and performing actions, players can unlock new rewards, outfits, and other items.
Collecting stickers by completing tasks can earn you special rewards and new items, including unique food.
As in previous games, you can earn coins and other gifts by taking care of the characters and completing challenges.
Development and Release
My Talking Tom Friends 2 was developed and published by Outfit7. It underwent a soft launch period in late 2024 and early 2025 under a different title before its official global release on July 15, 2025.
The game was initially released under the name Talking Tom Town. On December 4, 2024, the game first appeared on the Google Play Store for Android, but was removed a few weeks later on January 25, 2025. The game was relaunched on January 27, 2025, for Android, now titled My Talking Tom Friends 2. The iOS soft launch followed on February 4, 2025.
Release dates
* 4 December 2024 (Android, soft launch)
* 27 January 2025 (Android, relaunch & early access)
* 4 February 2025 (iOS, soft launch)
* 15 July 2025 (Android and iOS, global launch)
* 9 August 2025 (Huawei AppGallery)
Early versions of the soft launch were more limited, featuring only three characters and two mini-games.
Reception
Within one week of its global launch on July 15, 2025, My Talking Tom Friends 2 surpassed 6 million downloads. The game hit the #1 spot in the "Games" category on Google Play in 31 countries, including the US, UK, and Brazil.
The character Ginger was initially absent, which disappointed some long-time fans. The developers have since announced that Ginger will be added in a future update.
